# The `VPInterleaveRecipe` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpinterleaverecipe">VPInterleaveRecipe</a> is a recipe for transforming an interleave group of load or stores into one wide load/store and shuffles. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::VPInterleaveRecipe</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpinterleaverecipe">VPInterleaveRecipe</a> is a recipe for transforming an interleave group of load or stores into one wide load/store and shuffles.

The first operand of a VPInterleave recipe is the address, followed by the stored values, followed by an optional mask.

Definition at line 2564 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>.
